title: About
text: Still working on this, but long story short- I like data science, everything about energy, house music, and surfing;)

title: Rafe Chang
text:
Coding Projects
Here are some of my course and side projects.

pvpmSimulator

Description: A web app providing real-time and customizable simulation that calculates the solar energy potential loss caused by PM2.5.
Tools Used: pvlib, Air.gov api
Web App: pvpmSimulator (use Chrome)



Salmon Saver

Description: A pipeline with XGBoost modeling that predicts salmon outmigration timing to optimize fieldwork timing for salmon survival analysis.
Tools Used: PL/Python, SQL, XGBoost
GitHub Repo: Bottlenecks to Survival



Solar Savers

Description: A dashboard assisting Canadian homeowners to choose the optimal panel by calculating energy and financial savings at a given location.
Tools Used: dash
GitHub Repo: Solar Savers
Dashboard: Solar Savers
